channel.title: I NEED feedback on this
channel.description:
Hey guys, I usually don't get much feedback but I am asking kindly, please help me with this. I am making game for Android and iOS and the character is being made the same as flappy bird (no I am not making a knock off flappy bird game) but I need some help on how to make the character look a bit better. So I made this flappy bird freehand myself..
[img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/20pcih.jpg[/img]
and yes that is the exact scale of the real flappy bird.
Okay and then I made the character that will be in my game, but I feel like it doesn't look quite that right. Can you guys tell me what I should change on it?
[img]http://oi59.tinypic.com/es9k6u.jpg[/img]
